mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_scheduler(job_id, nid, running_status, prev_fire_time, next_fire_time) VALUES (#{jobId}, #{nid}, #{runningStatus}, #{prevFireTime}, #{nextFireTime})
mapper.select: SELECT js.id, js.job_id, ji.job_name, ji.crontab, ji.create_time, js.running_status, js.nid, js.prev_fire_time, js.next_fire_time FROM job_scheduler js, job_info ji WHERE js.job_id = ji.id
SELECT count(id) FROM job_scheduler WHERE job_id = #{jobId}
